thread.title: New Hampshire Now A "Constitutional Carry" State - Christine Rousselle
thread.title_full: New Hampshire Now A "Constitutional Carry" State - Christine Rousselle

author: Christine Rousselle
title: New Hampshire Now A "Constitutional Carry" State - Christine Rousselle
text:
New Hampshire Now A "Constitutional Carry" State Share Tweet Share Tweet 
As of Wednesday, New Hampshire has joined fellow New England states Maine and Vermont as a "Constitutional carry" state. This means that a person who legally possesses a firearm is able to carry that firearm legally, concealed or openly, without a permit. As of just now, New Hampshire is a “constitutional carry” state. pic.twitter.com/VJpwHgNdGE — Charles C. W. Cooke (@charlescwcooke) February 22, 2017 
The new rules go into effect immediately. 
There are now 12 states with permitless carry laws on the books.
